tweet: The #IOTA Foundation is still actively hiring. We're especially looking for more engineers and researchers to help us make IOTA enterprise-ready.  https://t.co/1R2yzF0JPs

The major argument of #IOTA antagonists is:  "IOTA will never be able to shut down the coordinator" Imagine the shock in their faces the moment we get the announcement which we know is coming. #coordicide A new chapter is on the horizon!  https://t.co/cnwLmfhJlO

Need a low-latency, high-speed & low-cost mechanism for implementing payment transactions? #IOTA with its zero transaction fees & scalable approach might be a perfect fit.   Read more at:  https://t.co/l0znWDHZQH  |  #Industry40 #IIoT #IoT @delizalde @3BodyProblem @fabot70  https://t.co/SADhzGmWdd
“As things stand, there are about 1,500 different cryptocurrencies, of which #bitcoin, #Ripple, #Ethereum and #IOTA are the four most important.” - @KPMG

If #IOTA would be responsible for 1 percent of the Internet of Things spend, that would mean a market capitalization of $ 15 billion. With a participation of 10%, this value would already be $ 150 billion.  150 billion USD = rate of 55 USD/MIOTA 分享者 Bitcoin_Julko  https://t.co/hJQkKiwXSo
Our new Listing Partner in the World Map of the #Tangle is called #IOTA Hardware. Their goal is to introduce the IOTA powered hardware. We warmly welcome @iotahardware  https://t.co/MXjq70B2Z2

PAYota - Electricity - Pay Electricity for what you use in #IOTA! Another nice use case we would like to see at Munich Hands-on Meetup...  Show us your use case! iotamunichmeetup@gmx.de   https://t.co/NTBlVbqxJo

The #IOTA Ecosystem Team is happy to announce three new grantees. All of whom will improve the understanding of IOTA and the Tangle. UNIO ($98,472) |  Green IOTA ($19,800) | Sebastian Mueller Research Grant ($18,900).  https://t.co/Z2v2TuGBqj

We welcome our new Listing-Partner from Australia in the #Tangle Universe. The Australian #IOTA enthusiasts and Evangelists @iota_aus are a group that supports IOTA especially regional but also global.  https://t.co/xEyPrVZSqL

The medium article "#Tangle Universe BETA 2.0 — the first virtual industrial fair focusing on DLT, IOTA and the Tangle starts September 2019" describes the working groups of the industrial fair #IOTA  https://t.co/a7gE7f75rJ
